title: Instagram unplugs IGTV after taking four years to realize no one wants a separate app
content:
Instagram on Monday announced that it is officially discontinuing its mobile app dedicated to the IGTV video platform – which was rebranded to Instagram Video last year. As a result of the shutdown, the IGTV app will soon be removed from the App Store and Google Play.

The post Instagram unplugs IGTV after taking four years to realize no one wants a separate app appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: According to Instagram, the IGTV app will be completely shut down and removed from the app stores in mid-March.
